Classes/OSLogEventSink.html#/s:6Events14.name: init(log:)
Classes/OSLogEventSink.html#/s:6Events14.abstract: Create a new os_log sink, optionally targeting a particular log.

Classes/OSLogEventSink.html#/s:6Events14.name: init(subsystem:category:)
Classes/OSLogEventSink.html#/s:6Events14.abstract: Create a new os_log sink for a particular subsystem and category.

Protocols/EventSink.html.name: EventSink
Protocols/EventSink.html.abstract: An EventSink is responsible for sending events to a particular destination.

Classes/OSLogEventSink.html.name: OSLogEventSink
Classes/OSLogEventSink.html.abstract: An EventSink for logging events to the Apple unified logging system.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV6enc.name: encode(to:)
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV6enc.abstract: Encodes the data in the event to an Encoder.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV6glo.name: global
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV6glo.abstract: An event builder for fields that will be added to all future events.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV7cur.name: current
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV7cur.abstract: The event that is currently in progress.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV3Key.name: Key
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV3Key.abstract: A key identifier for the different fields you can add to events.

Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV4sin.name: sink
Structs/Event.html#/s:6Events5EventV4sin.abstract: The default event sink for events in your application.

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: error
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: An error that should be logged with the event.

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: Get or set custom fields to include app-specific data in your events

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: Set a custom field to a value that will be evaluated on-demand when the event is sent.

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: startTimer(_:)
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: Starts a timer that will store a duration for a given key.

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: stopTimer(_:)
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: Stops a timer that was previously started and records the duration in the event.

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: send(_:)
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: Send the event to its sink using the default level.

Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.name: send(_:_:)
Structs/EventBuilder.html#/s:6Events12Ev.abstract: Send the event to its sink at a given level.

Structs/EventBuilder.html.name: EventBuilder
Structs/EventBuilder.html.abstract: An EventBuilder is what your app uses to add information to events and send them when they’re complete.

Structs/Event.html.name: Event
Structs/Event.html.abstract: An Event structure holds the information for a complete loggable event in your application.
